aboutData.title: Hi There! I'm Kavaya nelvine
aboutData.subtitle: Software Engineer
aboutData.text: I’m Nelvine (Kavaya) Isubire, a Software Engineer and Implementation Engineer based in Nairobi, Kenya. I build reliable web and mobile solutions using React, Node.js, and Python, and I enjoy turning real-world problems into scalable, secure systems. Currently pursuing a Master’s in Cybersecurity & Digital Forensics, I’m passionate about cloud technologies, DevOps, and building secure software that actually makes an impact.

services.title: Web & Application Development
services.text: Design and development of responsive, scalable web applications using modern frameworks(React, Node.js, and Python) focused on perfomance, usability and scalability.

services.title: Cybersecurity & Secure Software Engineering
services.text: Implementation of security best practices, access controls, and secure application design to protect systems and sensitive data.

services.title: Cloud & DevOps Engineering
services.text: Envirenment setup, CI/CD pipelines, environment configuration,Containerization and automation to support scalable and reliable deployments.

services.title: API Development, Backend Development & System Automation
services.text: Development of RESTful APIs and automated workflows to enable seamless communication between systems and services.

services.title: Systems Implementation & Integration
services.text: Deployment, configuration, and integration of enterprise systems, including data migration and third-party system mapping.

services.title: Technical Documentation & Training
services.text: Creation of professional documentation and user guides, plus technical training for teams and clients.

skillData.title: A snapshot of the technical skills I use to design, build, deploy, and secure modern software systems.
skillData.text: I work across the full software development lifecycle — from designing and developing web applications to integrating enterprise systems and deploying secure solutions. My skill set combines modern web technologies, backend development, databases, cloud tools, and security best practices, allowing me to deliver reliable systems that solve real-world problems.

informations.title: Understanding OWASP Top 10 Web Application Vulnerabilities
Adversarial Machine Learning: Security Implications for Critical Systems
Risk-Based Regulation of AI Systems (EU AI Act vs NIST AI RMF)
Prompt Injection and LLM Security Risks
Algorithmic Accountability and Cybersecurity: A Governance Framework
Augustine Wekesa
informations.text: Kavaya designed and developed a full system for DataMorphics Labs, delivering a professional, responsive, and user-friendly platform that showcases our services and projects effectively.!

informations.title: John Mwangi
informations.text: The website developed by Kavaya transformed our online presence. Guests can now book rooms easily, view menus, and take virtual tours. We’ve seen a noticeable increase in bookings since online launch!

informations.title: Carolyne Chepchumba
informations.text: I am the owner of Rhumba Café, and she built our hotel management system with great professionalism and skill. The system improved our reservations, billing, and overall operations, making our workflow more efficient. They were reliable, responsive, and attentive to our needs. I highly recommend their services.

informations.title: Dr. Ope Justus
informations.designation: Head of Department, CIS - Maasai Mara University
informations.text: During his studies, Kavaya showed strong problem-solving and development skills, particularly in AI/ML and full-stack projects, including his award-winning hackathon solutions!

experience.title: Software Implementer - Core & Digital Banking Solutions
experience.subTitle: NLS Tech Solutions
experience.text: Supported core banking and integrated digital banking solutions, including fintech platforms such as CM(channel manager), NQUEST and KOLLECT PRO. Provided production support for microservices and APIs, assisted with integrations, transaction monitoring, incident resolution, and system stability, collaborating with DevOps and banking operations teams.

experience.title: Lead Developer & System Implementer | POS System for Cafes/Restaurants
experience.subTitle: Codverts Systems (Intern/Volunteer)
experience.text: Developed and maintained a robust POS system using Laravel for cafe and restaurant operations. Implemented order management, inventory tracking, and CRM modules, integrated a new payment gateway, and ensured stability and performance through testing and code reviews.

experience.title: Industrial Attachment
experience.subTitle: SAV-IT Africa
experience.text: Gained exposure to enterprise IT infrastructure, DevOps practices, web hosting, application deployment workflows, and version control using Git/GitHub. Applied cybersecurity and digital transformation practices, including secure coding, system hardening, and web/endpoint security awareness.

education.title: Master of Cybersecurity and Digital Forensics
education.subTitle: EC-COUNSIL University
education.text: Currently pursuing a Master’s degree focused on cybersecurity operations, digital forensics, incident response, and cybercrime investigation. Building strong technical and analytical skills in securing systems, investigating digital evidence, and responding to modern cyber threats through hands-on labs, case studies, and research.

education.title: Bachelor of Computer Science
education.subTitle: Maasai Mara University
education.text: I graduated with a Second Class Upper Division (GPA 3.9). During my studies, I developed strong skills in software development, AI/ML, and web technologies, completing projects such as a CNN-based Breast Cancer Detection System and an RNN-based Speech Detection System. I also led my team to first place at the 2024 Kenya Inter-University Hackathon with an AI-powered solution addressing climate change in agriculture, showcasing my ability to apply innovative technology to real-world challenges.

contactData.title: Contact Info
contactData.subTitle: Visit my social profile and get connected
contactData.text: I enjoy turning innovative ideas into practical systems. Feel free to reach out to discuss projects, collaborations, or opportunities.
